auto_merge.commit_message:
Test against a CPython pydebug build of their main branch.

Debug builds of CPython apply various runtime checks and validations,
also against extension modules. We can use them to test for incorrect
usages of their C-API.

We already apply `-UNDEBUG` to some CI jobs but that only enables
header-level assertions. CPython's pydebug builds come with a lot of
internal validation code in addition.

repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
Test against a CPython pydebug build of their main branch.

Debug builds of CPython apply various runtime checks and validations, also against extension modules. We can use them to test for incorrect usages of their C-API.

commit.message: CI: Add a pydebug test job.
CI: Disable CPython dependencies for Python "-dev" jobs.

Fix f-string joining when non-ASCII "{intvalue:c}" character formats are involved.

Closes https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/7240
Install some CPython build dependencies to include more stdlib modules that might be used by tests.
